title: Build notedeck for iOS (iPhone 13)
description:
Build and deploy notedeck to a physical iPhone 13 using wgpu/Metal rendering.

## Tasks
- [x] Create notedeck_ios crate with wgpu Metal rendering
- [ ] Fix compilation errors in renderer.rs (borrow checker issues)
- [ ] Set up build scripts for iOS static library
- [ ] Create Swift view wrappers for egui rendering
- [ ] Create Xcode project structure
- [ ] Build and test on physical iPhone 13
